body:
I got the same problem, the program hang up at session config init, log like this:
`Training model...
当前运行模式为同步模式
2017-11-03 09:49:13.819230: I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/master_session.cc:998] Start master session 28f97991c51e14aa with config: `

anyone can solve this problem？ (ps: async mode can work well)
